snippet.title: Fractal Block World Computer Game Trailer
snippet.description:
This is a trailer for the game Fractal Block World, which is available to buy on Steam.  This is a surreal exploration game. Explore a massive fractal with great complexities. You can shrink infinitely to go deeper into the fractal. Or you can become larger by growing. Inner space awaits you in this infinite world.  You can play the game with monsters and action packed combat, or you can play in a monster free version for a relaxed experience.  You can also create your own procedurally generated worlds to be run with the engine.  We periodically add new areas to the world.

Here is the game's store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1540570/Fractal_Block_World/
